    GetRawValue

    public mixed GetRawValue(string $strConfigPath, mixed $strDefault=null)

    Returns configuration value which won't be processed in any way
    TypoScript path like some.setup.value is possible

    $strDefault -

    GetProperties

    public mixed GetProperties(string $strConfigPath)

    Returns configuration properties (array)
    TypoScript path like some.setup.property is possible

    Parameters

    isEnabled

    public boolean isEnabled(string $strConfigPath, mixed $strDefault=null)

    Check a config value if its enabled Anything except '' and 0 is true If the option is not set the default value will be returned

    Parameters

    $strConfigPath -
    $strDefault -
